metaData.label: GPs
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal General Medicine OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pharmacist Other

metaData.label: SPs
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatrics OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Paediatrics ) OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Internal Medicine OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Internal Medicine ) OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Dermatology ) OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Obstetrics Gynaecology OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Obstetrics Gynaecology )
